title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1000.3 - Secretaries of the authorities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1000.3 - Secretaries of the authorities

State Regulations

The secretaries of the authorities are the secretaries
designated by each authority to perform the duties required of the secretary
for that authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1000.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
